name: St. Jeanne Jugan

locations.description: Founder of the Little Sisters of the Poor

summary: Jeanne Jugan, also known as Sister Mary of the Cross, was a French religious sister who founded the Little Sisters of the Poor, a congregation dedicated to caring for the elderly poor. She began by taking in an elderly blind woman and her work grew into an international religious order. Despite being removed from leadership, she continued to serve humbly. She was canonized in 2009.
keyQuotes: Little, very little, be very little before God.
